text: Éric Assous (30 March 1956 – 12 October 2020) was a French director, screenwriter, dialoguist, and dramatist born in TunisNotice d'autorité of the BnF.. Assous was the author of 80 radio plays for the France Inter channel. He wrote numerous plays, as well as scenarios for television (including 3 episodes of the Nestor Burma series) and cinema. Assous directed his first feature film, ' in 2001. In 2002, he penned a new comedy entitled '. == Filmography == === Director === * 1999: À cause d'Olivia... short film * 2001: Les gens en maillot de bain ne sont pas (forcément) superficiels * 2002:
